column5: We love sharing our home and gardens with other travelers. Happy to guide you to local food finds, music & musicians. Just ask.  Huge trees shade our yard and line our street.  Cool AC and comfy bed with room darkening shades.  Garden space for you to relax in or work outside All-you-can-drink-coffee, juice & breakfast.  Keyless entry  Downtown by car in 10-15 min. 20 by bus @ $1.25, the stop is 2 blocks.
column8: 78722 For You! See Austin Like A Local.
